messages.subject: Re: Florida Butterfly Gardens
messages.msgSnippet: I thought I should mention to Floridians specifically, that Butterfly World in Coral Springs sells butterfly attracting plants, as well as many helpful
messages.messageBody:
I thought I should mention to Floridians specifically, that "Butterfly
World" in Coral Springs sells butterfly attracting plants, as well as many
helpful things.
I believe you can shop there even if you don't pay admission to walk around,
but call first, because I could be wrong about that.

I know a few people who are trying to start businesses in raising
butterflies to release during weddings instead of throwing rice or birdseed.
I'm not quite that ambitious. :)

Steph
